title: How to Become Well Known on Ratemydrawings

steps.headline: Create an account on RateMyDrawings.com.
steps.description: It is simple and will allow you to leave comments on artwork, participate in draw-chat and reply to forums located within Rate My Drawings.

steps.headline: Start off by going under the "Introduce Yourself" section of the RMD forums.
steps.description: Make a new topic that contains a bit about yourself. Be sure to show your personality. The more "in-yourface" you are the better.

steps.headline: Make a few drawings using the RMD drawing tool.
steps.description: The first few drawings you make will help you get accustomed to the operation of the RMD drawing tool. These drawings are your first stepping stones into digital artwork.

steps.headline: After you've made a drawing you'll have to accept it.
steps.description: There's steps to that on the site.

steps.headline: A good thing to do now is to go to the Recent Drawings section.
steps.description: Leave comments on several of the drawings. You can literally copy/paste a "Good Job 5 hearts!" Speaking of hearts - Don't forget to rate.

steps.headline: After you've made contact with some artists you'll start getting comments.
steps.description: Every once in a while you'll get a profile comment, be sure to reply.

steps.headline: Find some of the better artists and "Subscribe" to them.
steps.description: An even bigger compliment is to add them to your friends. When they're your friend you get their updates right on your profile page.

steps.headline: A good way to become popular is to enter lots of competitions.
steps.description: Even if the entry isn't that great the contest's host has to check it out.

text: Create an account on RateMyDrawings.com. It is simple and will allow you to leave comments on artwork, participate in draw-chat and reply to forums located within Rate My Drawings. Start off by going under the "Introduce Yourself" section of the RMD forums. Make a new topic that contains a bit about yourself. Be sure to show your personality. The more "in-yourface" you are the better. Make a few drawings using the RMD drawing tool. The first few drawings you make will help you get accustomed to the operation of the RMD drawing tool. These drawings are your first stepping stones into digital artwork. After you've made a drawing you'll have to accept it. There's steps to that on the site. A good thing to do now is to go to the Recent Drawings section. Leave comments on several of the drawings. You can literally copy/paste a "Good Job 5 hearts!" Speaking of hearts - Don't forget to rate. After you've made contact with some artists you'll start getting comments. Every once in a while you'll get a profile comment, be sure to reply. Find some of the better artists and "Subscribe" to them. An even bigger compliment is to add them to your friends. When they're your friend you get their updates right on your profile page. A good way to become popular is to enter lots of competitions. Even if the entry isn't that great the contest's host has to check it out.
